creator: pajungwirth@hotmail.com
text:
According to the documentation
(http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junit.html), the junit task's
formatter element takes an "if" or "unless" attribute. But when I try using
this, I get the following error message:

Class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.FormatterElement doesn't
support the "if" attribute.

This feature would be really handy!

The if and unless attributes have been added after ant 1.5.3.
The manual page at ant.apache.org is the the lastest released
version of ant - currently ant 1.6.1
